hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash -xe # Replace content in Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV APM_SECRET_TOKEN=|ENV APM_SECRET_TOKEN=${APMToken}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV SERVER_URL=0.0.0.0:4222|ENV SERVER_URL=${NATS_SERVER_URL}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV STARTUP_TYPE=nats|ENV STARTUP_TYPE=${NATS_SERVER_TYPE}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|${ImageRepository}/nats-utilities-rel-1-0-0|${ImageRepository}/nats-utilities-rel-1-0-0-${envName}|g" deployment.yaml sed -i "s/\${GH_TOKEN}/${READ_GH_TOKEN}/g" .npmrc # Login to container registry echo $REG_PASS | buildah login --username $REG_USER --password-stdin ${ImageRepository} # Build Docker Image buildah bud --format docker --ulimit nofile=4096:4096 -t ${ImageRepository}/nats-utilities-rel-1-0-0-${envName}:1.0.0 . # Push Docker Image to Container Registry buildah push ${ImageRepository}/nats-utilities-rel-1-0-0-${envName}:1.0.0 # Apply newly built image to a kubernetes pod kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml # Rollout restart the deployment to take effect kubectl rollout restart deployment nats-utilities-rel-1-0-0 -n processor # Apply the service configuration kubectl apply -f service.yaml
